subject: No so hicksville
body:
Anatrim will change your life!!

Burn pounds off with Anatrim...

Save your life! Lose your weight with anatrim.

Do not be stupid, save your life, mail!

Testimonials of using anatrim:

I always had a great sex life until last year a girl I was seeing told me I was fat and needed to start looking after my health. Life was never the same after that, until I found Anatrim. Since loosing more than 40 pounds thanks to Anatrim. , my sex life is back on track, better than before even. Thanks for the awesome product and the great service. Keep up the good work
Reed T. Mendoza
